import Header from "./Header" const ReviewForm = (props) => { const formSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let my_data = new FormData(e.target) my_data = Object.fromEntries(my_data.entries()) my_data.actors = my_data.actors.split("\n") my_data.image = URL.createObjectURL(my_data.image) let placeholder = props.movies placeholder.push(my_data) props.setMovies(placeholder) } return (
) } export default ReviewForm
